data.title: The Netherlands
data.meta_description: By Dutch standards turnout on 14 June 1984 to elect the 25 Dutch MEPs was unusually low. Admittedly, since the repeal of compulsory voting in 1970, the Dutch have become used to turnouts below 90%. Yet the 1984 turnout of 50.5% was below that of any other post-1970...
